navText.Your purchase of digital coins via credi: Your purchase of digital coins via credit card is facilitated by a third party service provider, Simplex Payment Services UAB.
navText.BitTorrent does not facilitate this tran: BitTorrent does not facilitate this transaction and expressly disclaims all warranties related to this third party service.
navText.The crypto amount quoted is based on the: The crypto amount quoted is based on the current rate and is not final.
navText.If the rate changes by more than +/-2.5%: If the rate changes by more than +/-2.5% you will be asked to reconfirm the transaction via email from Simplex.
navText.BTT is not available for direct purchase: BTT is not available for direct purchase from all geographic locations.
navText.If you have any questions, please contac: If you have any questions, please contact Simplex customer support at support@simplex.com.
navText.Please read the above and check the box: Please read the above and check the box to continue
navText.I have read and accept the terms of this: I have read and accept the terms of this purchase.

article.title: Important Information on BTT Withdrawal
article.description:
Dear user:


As the number of Bittorrent Speed users grows, so does our dedication to security and safety of our users' assets. As a result, and while we are working on improving our protection mechanisms, we decided to limit the BTT withdrawals to a 2,000,000 (2 million) token supply to be delivered among our users daily.

We are diligently working on the Exchange service status and will make sure to keep you posted on the progress.

Feel free to visit our Help Center at https://help.utorrent.com/support/home for updates, or raise any questions you may have by submitting a ticket here: https://help.utorrent.com/support/tickets/new

We thank you for your patience and apologize for any inconveniences this may cause you.


Regards,
The Bittorrent Support Team

articleList.title: Updates on the BTT Redenomination
articleList.description:
With the launch of The BTTC mainnet on Dec. 12th, we are doing a redenomination. The current token will become BTTOld while the new token will become BTT.  

BTTOLD equals 1000 BTT. This does not change the market cap of BTT or the value of your holdings, but will increase the number of tokens you hold and decrease the price - both by a factor of 1000. 

The swap from old to new tokens will depend on where you have your tokens. Some exchanges will automatically swap these while others will require some manual intervention. Please reach out to your exchange for their procedure. Since this is a new launch, it might take some time for exchanges to implement these changes. 

Prior to making a BTT transaction, we recommend reaching out to your exchange/wallet customer service to confirm the BTTOLD/BTT redenomination is supported. 

If you have not swapped the tokens by January 12, nothing will happen, they will remain as BTTOLD until they can be exchanged.

Click here for a tutorial on how to swap from BTTOLD to BTT.  

For more information, please visit our FAQ

The current token will become BTTOld while the new token will become BTT.    BTTOLD equals 1000 BTT. This does not change the market cap of BTT or the value of your holdings, but will increase the number of tokens you hold and decrease the price - both by a factor of 1000.   The swap from old to new tokens will depend on where you have your tokens. Some exchanges will automatically swap these while others will require some manual intervention. Please reach out to your exchange for their procedure. Since this is a new launch, it might take some time for exchanges to implement these changes.   Prior to making a BTT transaction, we recommend reaching out to your exchange/wallet customer service to confirm the BTTOLD/BTT redenomination is supported.   If you have not swapped the tokens by January 12, nothing will happen, they will remain as BTTOLD until they can be exchanged.  Click here for a tutorial on how to swap from BTTOLD to BTT.    For more information, please visit our FAQ

articleList.title: BTT Redenomination Status by Exchange
articleList.description:
Some exchanges have initiated the redenomination process from BTTOLD to BTT. During this time, exchanges may delist BTTOLD, suspend and/or experience transactions delays.

The table below lists some of the exchanges already working on the redenomination as well as links to their announcements including further details on their plans and timelines.

If your exchange is not listed here, we recommend reaching out to their customer support team for information on their course of action.


ExchangeBTT Redenomination AnnouncementSupport AddressSubmit a request
Binancehttps://www.binance.com/en/support/announcement/2722e6da4f5141dd9b2fb07b5b1f3f75https://www.binance.com/en/supporthttps://support.binance.us/hc/en-us/requests/new
Gate.iohttps://www.gate.io/article/24361https://www.gate.io/page/communitysupport@mail.gate.io
Metamaskhttps://wallet.bt.io/swap?language=ENhttps://metamask.io/faqs.htmlhttps://community.metamask.io/
Huobihttps://www.huobi.com/support/en-us/detail/54896291748810https://www.huobi.com/support/en-us/list/900000741691https://www.huobi.com/en-us/feedback/
TronLinkhttps://wallet.bt.io/swap?language=ENhttps://tron7010.zendesk.com/hc/en-ushttps://tron7010.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
MEXChttps://support.mexc.com/hc/en-001/articles/4414716310553-MEXC-to-Support-BitTorrent-BTT-Token-Migration-Redenomination-and-Renaming-Planhttps://support.mexc.com/hc/en-001https://support.mexc.com/hc/en-001/requests/new
EXMOhttps://info.exmo.com/en/currencies/exmo-to-delist-bittorrent-btt/
https://info.exmo.com/en/faq/https://support.exmo.me/hc/en-us/requests/new/
LEDGERhttps://support.ledger.com/hc/en-us/articles/4417715832593-Swapping-BTT-old-for-BTT-new-?support=true
https://support.ledger.com/hc/en-us/categories/4404369571601?support=true
https://support.ledger.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?support=true
Atomic Wallethttps://support.atomicwallet.io/article/241-btt-swap
https://support.atomicwallet.io/
https://atomicwallet.io/support

As usual, please feel free to contact us here if you need more information.

articleList.title: Check out our Improvements to the New BitTorrent Help Center!
articleList.description:
Thanks to your valuable feedback, we have upgraded our Help Center to provide users and customers with a more seamless experience. The Help Center allows you to receive help across the entire suite of BitTorrent brands and products and is available here:

https://www.bittorrent.com/help/

What’s New?

Re-designed home page

Refined the Help Center homepage to make it easier to find help for each BitTorrent and µTorrent product.

Adaptive search bar

Type in relevant questions or topics in the search bar and we’ll help provide smart recommendations to help find the answers you need.

Access to the latest product guides and releases

Get access to quick start guides, release notes, and announcements to get up to speed with our products.

Premium access for Pro, Pro+VPN, and Ad-Free users

Quickly manage your subscription, recover your license key, or receive invoice and purchase information. Pro, Pro+VPN and Ad-Free users receive faster response rates!

In addition to the new features, we have refined the look and feel of the Help Center to make it easier to find help articles for all BitTorrent and µTorrent products. If you still need help and are looking to contact us, you can create a ticket here. For faster response times, we encourage you to purchase one of our Pro products: BitTorrent Classic, BitTorrent Web, µTorrent Classic, and µTorrent Web. 

From everyone on the BitTorrent Customer Support Team, we look forward to better serving you as we expand our customer support efforts going into 2023!

articleList.title: BitTorrent has a New Help Center
articleList.description:
As part of our efforts to upgrade the customer support experience, we are pleased to announce the launch of a new BitTorrent Help Center. Available at https://help.bittorrent.com/support/home, you now have a single location to get help across the family of BitTorrent brands and products. 

Help topics are now organized into product tiles to make it easier to drill into specific products. You can find help for BitTorrent/µTorrent Classic and Web, BitTorrent/µTorrent Android, BitTorrent File System (BTFS), and Live Streaming. If you have an inquiry related to BitTorrent Token (BTT) or any of our blockchain initiatives, the BitTorrent Speed tile is where to click.

If you browse the various help topics and still need to reach out to us, you’ll notice a way to create a ticket at the bottom of each page. From everyone on the BitTorrent Customer Support Team, we are working hard to expand the help articles and content in each of the product categories, so please stay tuned. We look forward to better serving you as we ramp up our customer support efforts in 2022!
